|brand = D-Link |model = DWA-125 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = B1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = October 18, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DWA-125_rev_B1 |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = N150 |series = DWA-125 |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle
|vendor_id = 2001 |device_id = 3c1e |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = KA2WA123B1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Ralink;RT5370; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WUS-N27 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/02/2012 |estreldate = 04/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "8WUSN27..0A1G" is silkscreened on the board, indicating this device is an '''Alpha Networks''' device (w/ an internal model of WUS-N27). :This is the same text found on the [[D-Link DWA-123 rev B1]]'s board. There is no FCC ID on the label, but the FCC ID of the DWA-123 B1 has been assigned to this entry.
{{WiFiCert|WFA14770|03/21/2012}}
==Links of Interest== *[http://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Wireless/DWA-125/Drivers/rev.B/2.00/ DWA-125 B1 drivers (RU)] *[http://ftp.dlink.ru/pub/Wireless/DWA-125/Drivers/rev.B/2.00/DWA-125_B1_relese%20note_for%20Utitly_V2.00s0002.pdf It is estimated to have been released April 2012.]
